Container.Name: transmission-tracker-add
Container.Overview:
Fully automated script for adding more trackers to Transmission By AndrewMarchukov. UnRaid docker template By SeanZhang.
See no peers,seeds for some torrent(s)? Add more tracker(s) for Transmission This script automatically checks new torrents and adds trackers.
Container.Description:
Fully automated script for adding more trackers to Transmission By AndrewMarchukov. UnRaid docker template By SeanZhang.
See no peers,seeds for some torrent(s)? Add more tracker(s) for Transmission This script automatically checks new torrents and adds trackers.

Config.Name: Transmission Auth
Config.Description: Set transmission username and password. Transmission does not require user name and password by default.

Config.Name: Transmission Host Port
Config.Description: Set Host Port used by your transmission.

Config.Name: Tracker List
Config.Description: Set the link of the tracker list you wish to use.
